original_text: Then Saul's anger was kindled against Jonathan, and he said to him, “You son of a perverse, rebellious woman, do I not know that you have chosen the son of Jesse to your own shame, and to the shame of your mother's nakedness?
korean_text: 사울이 요나단에게 화를 내며 그에게 이르되 패역무도한 계집의 소생아 네가 이새의 아들을 택한 것이 네 수치와 네 어미의 벌거벗은 수치 됨을 내가 어찌 알지 못하랴

sentences.original_text: Then Saul's anger was kindled against Jonathan
You son of a perverse, rebellious woman
sentences.korean_translation: 너 이 패역하고 반항적인 계집의 아들아

sentences.original_text: that you have chosen the son of Jesse
and to the shame of your mother's nakedness
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네 어미의 벌거벗은 수치를 더하였느냐
